titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Century of Progress International Exposition Press Releases1934
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by SCRC

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Century of Progress International Exposition Press Releases

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Typed carbon copies of press releases issued by Century of Progress, Publicity Division, Chicago.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Century of Progress International Exposition Press Releases, Crerar Ms 225, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Typed carbon copies of press releases issued by A Century of Progress, Publicity Division, Chicago, arranged in chronological order within each volume. Note that the earliest press releases are in Volume Nine.

Volume One: June, 1934. Volume Two: July 2-15, 1934. Volume Three: July 16-31, 1934. Volume Four: August 1-15, 1934. Volume Five: August 16-31, 1934. Volume Six: September 1-15, 1934. Volume Seven: September 19-29, 1934. Volume Eight: October, 1934. Volume Nine: February-May, 1934.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
